name: Itequia
description:
Transform great ideas into working software that users love. In weeks, not years.
We design & build custom software solutions for large and small organizations.
By applying modern design & development principles, and the latest technologies, our team of designers and developers will tailor our process based on your scale and structure to get the best results.
With over 10 years of experience, an engineering-oriented company, and many industry certifications, such as Microsoft Gold Partner, Xamarin Premier Consulting Partner and Nintex Certified Partner, you are in good hands.
